TEXT.TITLE: <SCAN-GRAPHICS INC>IN MCDONNELL DOUGLAS<MD> PACT
TEXT.BODY: Scan-Graphics Inc said it has received about 500,000 dlrs in orders for its new CF1000 Scanner and RAVE software, a document scanning and vectorizing system, from McDonnell Douglas Corp. Reuter
